resource_dependency.postSchema: Table 'posts': id (UUID), title (string), content (text), topic_id (foreign key to topics.id), created_at (timestamp), updated_at (timestamp)
resource_dependency.replySchema: Table 'replies': id (UUID), post_id (foreign key to posts.id), content (text), created_at (timestamp)

function: Allow users to create anonymous discussion posts under predefined topics.
static_description: A form with a title input field, a content text area, and a dropdown menu populated with available topics. Submit button styled with dark olive green background and honeydew text.

interaction_and_states.description: Clicking the submit button sends the new post data to the backend API endpoint /api/posts. Form clears after successful submission.

resource_dependency.replySchema: Table 'replies': id (UUID), post_id (foreign key to posts.id), content (text), created_at (timestamp)

function: Enable users to respond anonymously to existing forum posts.
static_description: Below each post, display a reply form containing a text area and a submit button styled with dark olive green background.

interaction_and_states.description: Clicking the reply submit button sends the reply content along with the associated post ID to the backend API endpoint /api/replies.

function: Allow users to find relevant discussions through browsing or searching.
static_description: At the top of the main page, show a search bar with placeholder 'Search posts...' and a list view displaying paginated posts with titles, excerpts, and topic tags.

interaction_and_states.description: Pressing enter in the search bar triggers a GET request to the search API with the query parameter.
Scrolling near the bottom loads more posts dynamically using pagination parameters sent to the browse posts API.

resource_dependency.followTopicSchema: Table 'user_follows': id (UUID), topic_id (foreign key to topics.id), created_at (timestamp)

function: Let users subscribe to specific topics to track related activity.
static_description: Each topic tag displays next to its respective posts, accompanied by a toggle-style button labeled 'Follow'/'Unfollow', styled with dark olive green border and text.

interaction_and_states.description: Toggling the follow button sends a POST/DELETE request to /api/topics/{id}/follow depending on current state, updating local UI accordingly without reloading the page.

resource_dependency.notificationSchema: Table 'notifications': id (UUID), user_id (not directly tied to identity due to anonymity), topic_id (foreign key to topics.id), message (text), read_status (boolean), created_at (timestamp)

function: Notify users about new activity within their followed topics.
static_description: A bell-shaped icon placed in the header navigation bar changes color when unread notifications exist; clicking opens a dropdown panel showing recent alerts.

interaction_and_states.description: Opening the notification panel marks visible items as read and makes a PATCH call to update statuses server-side.
New replies matching subscribed topics trigger instant WebSocket messages which appear in the notification dropdown automatically.

function: Maintain complete user anonymity by avoiding collection of identifying information.
static_description: Footer includes a link to Privacy Policy accessible via resource dependency URL. No cookies banner or tracking pixels present anywhere on site.

resource_dependency.authMiddlewareConfig: JWT-based session management disabled; all routes publicly accessible but rate-limited
resource_dependency.rateLimitRules: Apply throttling per IP address to prevent abuse

function: Prevent unauthorized access while preserving open participation.
static_description: All pages load normally regardless of login status. Behind-the-scenes middleware enforces rate limits silently without user-facing prompts.

function: Establish consistent background styling across entire application.
static_description: Entire webpage uses honeydew (#F0FFF0) as base background color applied globally through CSS variable referenced in resource dependency.

function: Define uniform component accent coloring throughout interface.
static_description: Buttons, form borders, active links, and other interactive elements utilize dark olive green (#556B2F) sourced from global CSS theme variable.

function: Ensure all displayed content originates exclusively from backend services.
static_description: Initial rendering waits for asynchronous data fetches before populating views such as homepage feeds, individual post threads, and topic listings.

resource_dependency.databaseInitScript: SQL file defining tables for posts, topics, replies, follows, notifications

function: Connect backend logic to persistent storage layer using provided credentials.
static_description: Backend initializes once during startup by reading environment variables listed in resource dependency and executing schema setup script if needed.

resource_dependency.installScriptCommand: "install:all": "cd frontend && npm install && cd ../backend && npm install"

function: Automate full-stack dependency resolution with single command execution.
static_description: Running 'npm run install:all' from root directory sequentially installs packages for both frontend and backend modules as defined in package.json scripts section.

resource_dependency.concurrentDevScript: "dev": "concurrently \"cd frontend && npm run dev\" \"cd backend && npm run dev\""

function: Streamline development workflow by launching frontend and backend simultaneously.
static_description: Executing 'npm run dev' launches both client-side and server-side watchers concurrently using concurrently library configured in package.json script definition.

resource_dependency.realtimeWebSocketAPI: Establish bidirectional communication channel at /ws for live updates
resource_dependency.notificationPollingFallback: Fallback mechanism polling /api/notifications every 30 seconds if WebSocket fails

function: Deliver immediate feedback upon new replies and notifications.
static_description: Client establishes persistent WebSocket connection on app load. Fallback polling activates only if WebSocket handshake fails.

resource_dependency.moderationDashboardSchema: Table 'reported_content': id (UUID), report_type (enum: spam/inappropriate/offensive), target_id (UUID referencing either post or reply), reporter_ip_hash (anonymized identifier), resolved (boolean), reported_at (timestamp)
resource_dependency.adminModerationAPI: Protected endpoints requiring manual authentication for reviewing flagged content

function: Empower administrators to review potentially harmful contributions.
static_description: Hidden administrative route exposes dashboard listing pending reports grouped by severity level, featuring inline actions to delete or dismiss flagged entries.

interaction_and_states.description: Moderator clicks 'Delete' or 'Dismiss' buttons send DELETE/PATCH requests respectively to moderation-specific endpoints to alter database records accordingly.
